title: Web Development
description: I build responsive and optimized websites using modern technologies like React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase.

title: UI/UX Design
description: I design user interfaces that are clean, intuitive, and user-focused using Figma and Tailwind UI principles.

title: Backend Development
description: I build scalable backend APIs using Firebase Functions. I also have experience with Python, PHP, Java, and SQL.

title: Database Integration
description: I integrate Firebase Realtime DB, Firestore, or MySQL into web projects for dynamic data handling.
